## BaseExtensionOptions.extraAttrs property

Inject additional attributes into the defined mark / node schema. This can only be used for `NodeExtensions` and `MarkExtensions`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extraAttrs?: ExtraAttrs[];
```

## Remarks

Sometimes you need to add additional attributes to a node or mark. This property enables this without needing to create a new extension.

- `extraAttrs: ['title']` Create an attribute with name `title`<!-- -->.When parsing the dom it will look for the attribute `title` - `extraAttrs: [['custom', 'false', 'data-custom'],'title']` - Creates an attribute with name `custom` and default value `false`<!-- -->. When parsing the dom it will look for the attribute `data-custom`
